title: (40400) El Espinar - 1 Camino Vegas
description: Parking at the entrance of the village next to the cemetery. Quiet place to spend the night. Next to the parking: recreational area with football and basketball court, swings for children, picnic tables and a fountain. Possibility of hiking and mountain bike routes. Village center 5 minutes walk.

title: (40400) El Espinar - 85 Diseminado Diseminado
description: Hermitage car park. along a busy road

title: (40400) El Espinar - Unnamed Road
description: A very quiet place with beautiful views. There is a source of drinking water nearby.Night prohibited

title: (40410) El Espinar - 13 Paseo Quintana

title: (40410) El Espinar - 2 Calle San Juan
description: Entrance of the high parking the Lions

title: (40410) El Espinar - 31 Carretera Coruña
description: Fill up space for water. Slow but tasty

name: Camping La Nava
title: (05239) Camping La Nava
description:
Very large campsite with free pitches. Very quiet even on weekends. A few permanent caravans. Friendly welcome. Internet only by wifi at the bar. No network in the campsite.
Much quieter than the Enmedio campsite next door. No swimming pool.

address.street: Carretera de Peguerinos- Alto del León KM 3600

name: Camping Valle Enmedio
title: (05239) Camping Valle Enmedio
description: Valle de enmedio campsite, an excellent place to hike through the Sierra de Guadarrama natural park. spacious pitches, some with some unevenness.

title: (05239) Peguerinos - Camino de los Rajuelos
description: La Nava Recreational Area, next to the Campings. Little mobile coverage. Spacious, level, without services, only with fountain and barbecues to use except the summer months. Quiet at night but very popular during the day on weekends. Nice place and with hiking trails.

title: (40423) Vegas de Matute - 4 Camino de la Dehesa
title_short: (40423) Vegas de Matute - 4 Camino de la Dehesa
description: Area and eco-sanitary point for the use of motorhomes in a quiet town and close to the N 110, next to the municipal swimming pool and bar-restaurant. 33 kilometers from Segovia. Counting on the advice of ACYLA

title: (28480) Guadarrama - 13 Arrabal Extrarradio
description: Car park of El Alto de los Leones. I think we can decide and stay overnight, to be confirmed. Excellent view.

title: (05239) Peguerinos - 49 Peñas Blancas
description: Small parking on the side of the road that gives access to the Peguerinos campsite and the Abantos high. It is next to the road but it is quiet. Helpful and welcoming people. Nice mountain routes in the area.

title: (05239) Peguerinos -
description: Quiet place in the middle of nature, right in front of the swamp to take a morning dip. The access road is not paved and is two-way, there are several entrances to park. It is important to mention that the road does not surround the entire reservoir and that it is not recommended for very low vehicles.

title: (05239) Peguerinos - Calle Villa
description: Parking in front of the lake in the middle of nature, an inhabitant of the closest town, Peguerinos, told me. Very quiet place. There are 2 "parkings" when you follow the path, both the same.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Carretera de La Jarosa
description: Beautiful spots among the pine trees, Reservoir close by for walking around with dogs. Lots of walking tracks in the hill also! There is a little church and cafe but they weren’t open while we were there. We stayed for 3 nights with out a problem. Lots of rubbish bins around the site. There are a few little spots of the road running around the lake with ample amount of space for several motorhome . Only 45 mins from Madrid

title: (28440) Guadarrama -
description: Very large parking lot under the pine trees located near a bar, early morning hiker, 20 minutes from Valle los Caidos and 1:00 from Madrid. Access with nasturtium cc and 7 meters long. There is very clean service.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Carretera de La Jarosa
description: Beautiful place to spend the night in nature listening to the cows and with the possibility of having breakfast looking at the reservoir. recommendable

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Carr de la Jarosa
description: One of the 3 car parks that the reservoir has. It is the furthest (one kilometer from the first) but it is worth it for its tranquility to sleep. The reservoir is next door, you can have dinner next to the reservoir (with your chairs, table and food) and enjoy a night under the stars. Natural environment and very quiet. There is no service. It depends on whether you are in the car park. In the previous car park, about 500 meters away, there is a restaurant.

title: (28209) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Unnamed Road
title_short: (28209) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Unnamed Road
description: Parking once past the entrance to the Valle de Los Caídos by the bus door, take the direction of the monastery and you will find a very large parking. Only open at the time of the visits.

title: (28209) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - s/n Carretera de Guadarrama
title_short: (28209) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - s/n Carretera de Guadarrama
description: Parking to visit the basilica, available during opening hours. you have to pay at the entrance of the site, except Sunday which is free for EU nationals ...

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Carr de la jarosa
description: Good parking to spend the night without any more noise.

title: (28296) Las Herreras -
description:
Old exit from the road. slightly on slope. very calm. cars are not heard. only birds.
there is a bit of garbage [rubble bags, televisions]

title: (40422) Segovia - Unnamed Road
description: Of course parking about 200 meters from a church with picnic tables. You can walk there. Take the “Hermitage” route, especially when approaching. Lots of space and wonderfully quiet but with a lot of height difference. 1 ramp is actually too little. Many flies, but that belongs in a rural area with cows nearby. We were all alone, beautiful! Nice view too.

title: (28296) Santa María de la Alameda - Panoramica De Sierra De Gredos, Unnamed Road
title_short: (28296) Santa María de la Alameda - Panoramica De Sierra De Gredos, Unnamed Road
description: Access by a dirt road, no problem for a van, we spent a very quiet night, very beautiful views, a restaurant nearby in the village, without services.

address.street: Panoramica De Sierra De Gredos, Unnamed Road

title: (40150) Villacastín - Autopista del Noroeste
description: Autogrill area h24 convenient for stopping one night without leaving the main road

title: (40151) Ituero y Lama - N-110
description: Narrow passage at the start, rolling road, but arrived on small grassy esplanade. Very pleasant. A little noise of cars but for one night it's quieter.

title: (28297) Santa María de la Alameda - M-535
title_short: (28297) Santa María de la Alameda - M-535

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 12 Calle de la Sierra

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 21 Calle Fuente del Espino
description: Quiet street for parking with chalets on both sides. We have spent the night very very well. Recommended for a rest stop.

title: (28460) Los Molinos - 7 Calle las Dalias
description: Central, quiet and flat esplanade of land used as a town parking lot. Good place to park comfortably and spend the night to visit the mountains on the shuttle bus. Note: In summer there may be more noise from young people who make a bottle and in September it is occupied by the portable bullring for the festivities

title: (40150) Villacastín - 22D Paseo Carrascal
description: It is a small and quiet playground just in front of the hermitage. It is not too flat but it is quiet for a night's sleep.

title_short: (40421) Ortigosa del Monte - 25 Calle Cercado del Cristo

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 5 Calle de los Escoriales
description: Parking behind the supermarket with many places for any size. Did not slept here, but used to visit the city

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Río Guadiana
description: Large esplanade with part in shadow next to several gas stations with shop and a Supercor. Very quiet, even at the Guadarrama parties.

title: (40150) Villacastín - 52 Calle Ávila
description: Large area of land to park and spend a quiet night. There are usually trucks parked, so you are calm because you are not alone, but there is no noise. Highly recommended if you can't find another place to sleep.

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 382 Calle Monte Escorial
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 382 Calle Monte Escorial

In general sunny, although it has some shadows. It has no height limitation. To sleep it is super quiet since the asphalted forest track has hardly any traffic and less at night. Fountain and garbage containers one kilometer below.

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 20 Avenida Carlos Ruiz
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 20 Avenida Carlos Ruiz

title: (28479) Cercedilla - 5 Diseminado las Dehesas
description: Parking located in the meadows of Cercedilla. There are several parking spaces, a little more distant than others. Setting where we have a restaurant opposite and the baths (although still seen closed). Please take care and respect the site with discretion

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 11 Camino de Peguerinos
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 11 Camino de Peguerinos

title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Camino del Hospital

title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 183 Calle Monte del Fraile

title: (28280) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - M-600

title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 120 Paseo Carlos III
description: Level parking. Next to the prince's house. Capacity for about 10 vehicles. 10 minutes from the monastery walking. It is next to the road but generally quiet. Fountain and garbage containers 500 meters towards the town, in a recreational area that is on the right hand side.

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 12 Pasaje Carlos III
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 12 Pasaje Carlos III
description: Parking very close to the monastery of San Lorenzo. We spent two days in May and we were able to park and sleep without problems. During the day, the car park is full, but in the evening we are alone. Totally recommended to visit the city, hiking routes and bike rides ..

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 12-14 Avenida Juan de Borbón y Battenberg
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 12-14 Avenida Juan de Borbón y Battenberg

title: (05230) Las Navas del Marqués - CL-505
description: Great place to stop and eat, lots of shade.

title: () San Lorenzo de El Escorial -
description: Very quiet place to spend the night, right next to the Bosque de la Herrería, with tables to eat and paths to walk around. 10 minutes from San Lorenzo de El Escorial. Yes, there is a certain slope.

title: (05230) Las Navas del Marqués -
description: Recreational area of Valladal. Around the area, many nice places more or less flat. Easy access.

description: Parking behind the sports center in a dead end street. surrounded by chalets

title: (05239) La Estación - Unnamed Road
description: We spent a night in the middle of nature surrounded by a pine forest. There is an accessible dirt road and the road is relatively close although the cars are not heard. Early in the morning someone can pass by for a walk. Very cool place at night.

title: (28470) Cercedilla - 53 Calle Manuel González Amezúa
description: Great quiet and quiet place, attached to a small river, (You can only hear the relaxing noise of the water). To park and spend the night, ideal if you travel with young children like me. There is a small playground, a picnic area and a hiking trail.

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Calle Calleja Larga
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Calle Calleja Larga
description:
Area of large meadows with plenty of space to park.
go to the end of the road where you will find a barrier that cuts it off.
Just behind the Escorial monastery.
during the day there are cars but at night it is empty and very quiet.

title: (28280) El Escorial - 85B Calle de Santa Rosa
title_short: (28280) El Escorial - 85B Calle de Santa Rosa
description: Free parking at El Escorial train station.

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - M-505
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - M-505
description: Parking adjacent to the climb to the throne of FelipeII. Isolated Quiet. Nature. There is a road leading to the monastery.

title: (28280) El Escorial - 4I Poligono Sector 1 Ensanche
description: Very quiet urbanized area to spend the night. flat and illuminated surface. Without services

title: (28280) El Escorial - 3E Poligono Sector 1 Ensanche
description:
Cerca de la ciudad de San Lorenzo del escorial.Zona asfaltada sin urbanizar.
Pase una noche en auténtico silencio y con pajaros cantando al amanecer.
Buenas vistas.
Gente paseando por la mañana Muy respetuosa.
Recomiendo.

title: (28470) Cercedilla - 211 Diseminado Embalse Navalmedio
description: Parking on the ground. Quiet, access by small road in good condition. Hiking, mountain biking and climbing. Do not forget that it is a car park, not a campsite, we are discreet, to empty and fill one goes to the El Boalo area. Be careful in winter, the road can be cut by the snow.

name: Camping AERODROME OF FUENTEMILANOS
title: (40153) Camping AERODROME OF FUENTEMILANOS
description: Campsite open between June 1 and August 31 together with the best non-powered flight range in Europe

address.street: Camino de Fuentemilanos a Valverde del Majano

title: (28450) Collado Mediano - 3 Calle de los Sauces
title_short: (28450) Collado Mediano - 3 Calle de los Sauces
description: A fairly flat parking lot. There is a bar nearby, very quiet at night.

title: (28491) Navacerrada - 15 Calle Tejera
description: Small esplanade to park during the day and overnight. The road is next to it but at night no cars pass by. It is the beginning of an area of hiking and MTB routes.

title: (28491) Navacerrada - 2 Avenida del Rosal
description: Quiet place where you can park with 3 stone tables and litter bins. quiet area to sleep

title: (28293) Zarzalejo - 1P Calle del Caño Viejo
description: Flat land area to park 4 or 5 Motorhomes, with two picnic tables and small playground, near the M-533 road frequented by bikers and cyclists during the day, at night very quiet, without any noise. 3 minutes from the town square. and 200 meters from a source of untreated water with another playground.

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 13 Calle 6 Sau
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 13 Calle 6 Sau
description: It is a 24h Carrefour express gas station, it will be the first night here I suppose it will be good for us, since we have many truckers also resting here, the good thing that we also have is that you can buy at the same gas station for an emergency I hope it helps

title: (05291) Maello - Carretera N-VI madrid Coruña
description: Ample parking next to a very tasty and pleasant restaurant. We spent a night passing through and no problem. The owners of the bar have no problem with overnight stays. rural road behind to walk with furry.

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Autopista del Noroeste
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - Autopista del Noroeste
description: Parking in the Service area of the Cepsa gas station, if you come on the A6 towards Madrid, to rest before entering Madrid, we spend the night and sleep is fine, at 23.00 the gas station and the bar close until 7 , 00 so there is little movement, except for a few trucker who stop to rest.

title: (05240) Navalperal de Pinares - 48 Avenida de Julio Arenillas
title_short: (05240) Navalperal de Pinares - 48 Avenida de Julio Arenillas
description: Spanish municipalities, take an example! Small, pretty and fully equipped camper area, a real jewel overlooking a splendid hilly landscape. Arriving on the road, you will find horses, cows, goats and sheep almost everywhere! The area has well-done loading and unloading (50 cents for 150 liters of water and 20 cents for unloading the toilet), separate waste collection, column for four electrical connections (payment by card, contactless, of 2 euros for 24 hours of supply ), free access to municipal wifi and video surveillance! The stalls are slightly sloping, which can be solved with wedges. The village is certainly worth a visit, there is also a train station nearby, if you want to move around Madrid, from here it is very simple and safe for your vehicle. Only applause!

title: (28491) Navacerrada - Magdalena 15-17
description: Quiet place to park and spend the night. It lacks services but it is very close to the urban center and one step away from the Navacerrada reservoir.

title: (28491) Navacerrada - 9A Calle Presbítero Blanco
description:
Free public parking just behind the local police office. To enter this place you must have access between the police building and El Porrón Restaurant.
At the corner of the entrance you can see a yellow sign indicating the direction to this public parking.
It is a place protected from the wind and very quiet since it is located between urbanized areas and although it is very close to the center, no noise or traffic is heard.
It has a large park but the nearest fountain is in Plaza del Gargantón a few meters away and from which you can catch water but not load tanks with hose.
At the moment it is of beaten earth and it is a very calm place.
Prohibited to remove tables, chairs or any other camping element. Please respect the environment and use the bins.

title: (28430) Alpedrete - 32 Calle del Licenciado Vidriera
description: Quiet parking with the possibility of routes

title: (28491) Navacerrada - 3 Pasaje de las Eras
description: Small parking on the other side of the park. a little more flat and quiet for my taste, there is less passage of people and on Sundays there are fewer people, because in the parking lot below many people leave the car to take the vermouth from the El Porron bar and sometimes they block the access road , do not miss visiting it, playground next door. It is a parkimg not a campsite. prohibited to take out goods abroad. Vehicles over 7m50 pass carefully

title: (28430) Alpedrete - 24 Calle de la Pasada
description: Nice place in the mountains of Madrid, surrounded by nature, there are quarries but bathing is prohibited, a fishing spot, ample flat parking and with the possibility of many hiking and MTB routes

title: (28430) Alpedrete - 32B Calle de Santa Quiteria
description: Parking place where many cars enter and there is a lot of space. Right in front there is a huge park with skate park soccer fields and a fountain

title: (28280) El Escorial - 1884 M-505
description: Quiet place near the hermitage, except for the traffic.

title: (28439) Alpedrete - 22 Calle de la Parra
description: Very quiet residential area, with a playground.

title: (28491) Navacerrada - 3A Calle del Párroco Desiderio García
title_short: (28491) Navacerrada - 3A Calle del Párroco Desiderio García
description: A beautiful place by the river without noise and perfect as a starting point for many routes. It is a bit difficult to find the level but it is easy and as it is right at the entrance of the natural park it is allowed to stay overnight.

title: (28470) Cercedilla - 9 Calle de la Virgen de las Nieves
title_short: (28470) Cercedilla - 9 Calle de la Virgen de las Nieves
description: Parking of the Navacerrada port station, quiet place at the moment

title: (40100) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - CL-601
title_short: (40100) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - CL-601
description: Abundant source of drinking water. watering can required. Tasty water.

title: (28491) Navacerrada - Calle Carretera la Barranca 6
description: Parking to start routes through the Malicious and Bola del mundo. Compact earth soil with a little slope in its lower part. It lacks services except garbage and has two parking areas (I prefer the parking above). TO SLEEP: They have recently banned overnight in the entire National Park environment. RECOMMENDED: Quiet and secure parking in Navacerrada

title: (28400) Collado Villalba - 33 Calle Cañada Real
description: Place to park in Villalba, near the old town and near shopping centers

title: (28260) Galapagar - 14 Calle del Zafiro
description: Motorhome parking in a quiet urbanization. The urbanization has a guard booth with a barrier but they always open as it is an urbanization built on public land.

name: Dehesa Park
title: (28400) Dehesa Park
description: Dehesa Park car park. Area with trees. Picnic area, fountains, circuit of about 4 km surrounded by cows, bulls, horses... Chiringuito nearby. About 10 minutes walk from the village of Villalba with all services (pharmacy-opencor-bakery-shops, municipal swimming pool and restaurants).

title: (28294) La Estación - 289 Calle Francisco de Zurbaran
title_short: (28294) La Estación - 289 Calle Francisco de Zurbaran
description: Public parking, level dirt floor, ample for ACs. Next to the train station to go to Ávila, Madrid, El Escorial, ... Very friendly town. Formerly there was a water source nearby. In summer there are some small shops.

title: (28292) El Escorial - 3A Calle Principal
description: Parking next to El Náutico Restaurant. Very nice and quiet area although at night you can receive neighbors a little partying but without major problem and not until too late. In the restaurant you eat great! Recommended.

title: (40100) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - SG-615
title_short: (40100) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - SG-615
description: Quiet parking with incredible views and incomparable natural surroundings. In summer it is cool and quiet.

title: (40109) La Pradera de Navalhorno - SG-615
description: Large parking 500 m from other parking. Quiet, no other vehicles. View of the valley with bench.

title: (28292) El Escorial - 2A Calle Principal
description: Valmayor reservoir car park

title: (28490) Becerril de la Sierra - 2 Avenida de las Flores
title_short: (28490) Becerril de la Sierra - 2 Avenida de las Flores
description: Washing machines located in gas station.

title: (40100) La Granja de San Ildefonso - CL-601
title_short: (40100) La Granja de San Ildefonso - CL-601
description: Very quiet parking lot Many hiking and biking trails are possible. Overnight stays are prohibited from 10:30 p.m. to 7:30 a.m.

title: (28411) Moralzarzal - 3 Calle de la Tejera
description: Public parking of the Tejera. Fairly quiet. Next to a park with tables and trees. There are services, but they are closed. In the park there is a fountain. Next to the town, with all the services; Supermarket, bar, restaurant, hardware store. Ideal for walking or cycling routes

title: (28295) Valdemaqueda - 31 Travesía dos de Mayo
description: Square in the center of town, next to the road, apparently you can park, I spent a night in between, beautiful area to do routes

title: (28270) Colmenarejo - Unnamed Road
description: Small car park with direct access to the reservoir. Bathing is prohibited in the reservoir and it is required to be in compliance with the responsible declaration of the CHT to be able to navigate with a SUP board or any other boat. There are usual checks.

title: (28210) La Pizarrera -
description: We spent 2 nights there without being disturbed. Quiet place some hikers and fishermen during the day. Fairly flat place to park a van or motorhome, a small pitch remains in the shade for most of the day (2 vehicles). Access is via a path with a few holes, but it is not inconvenient to access it. A restaurant bar is located around the lake, you can go there by canoe or paddle. We bathed every day, the water is quite clean. Around you can see the mountains, it's very pretty! We went to eat at a restaurant (7min by car) “restaurante casavieja” we eat very well there!

title: (28490) Becerril de la Sierra - Carretera de Colmenar Viejo
title_short: (28490) Becerril de la Sierra - Carretera de Colmenar Viejo
description: A hidden place. I did not have to activate all-wheel drive but a motorhome will not pass well up to here

name: Camping El Canto la Gallina
title: (28295) Camping El Canto la Gallina
description: Camping open all year round and dog friendly, quiet. Great and good treatment.

title: (28295) Valdemaqueda - 1X Calle Umbría
description: Small esplanade of grass and earth, with beautiful views near the town and the beginning of the route to the Roman bridge and river cofio, I discovered it when I returned from the route because I parked the AC in a square in the town

title: (28294) Robledo de Chavela - 13 Paseo del Cerro
title_short: (28294) Robledo de Chavela - 13 Paseo del Cerro
description: Picnic area, to stop to eat and see the town

title: (28492) El Boalo - 72P Avenida de los Linares
title_short: (28492) El Boalo - 72P Avenida de los Linares
description: Wooded parking in the center of the village. It is a quiet place to stay overnight, even if it is in the city. There is a large parking lot, in the upper part it is more hidden from view and there is a lot of shade. It is in the center but it is discreet and very calm. Opposite there are shops and next to it is the town square, where there is a fountain and wc. At the foot of the Maliciosa, in the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park. There are many trails, PR, GR, Camino de Santiago ... it is also near La Pedriza, La Barranca and Puerto de Navacerrada.

title: (28741) Rascafría - Calle Angostura

title: (40109) Valsaín - 7 Travesía Robledo

title: (28492) Mataelpino - 14 Calle del Pocillo
description: Dirt parking on the outskirts of town, next to the Camino de Santiago. Dirt parking in the upper part of the town, at the exit towards La Maliciosa and La Barranca. The Camino de Santiago and a cattle route pass by, a little further on there is a cattle resting place with a large trough where dogs can cool off very comfortably. Very quiet and discreet place to spend the night although it is within the town. Nearby there are shops and the town square, where there is a fountain and bathrooms. There is also a hostel for pilgrims. From that point there are two super nice roads, one to the west along the livestock route and the other to the east through the Sierra de los Porrones, with spectacular views). At the foot of Maliciosa, in the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park. There are many routes, PR, GR, Camino de Santiago... La Pedriza, La Barranca and Puerto de Navacerrada are also nearby.

title: (05268) Santa Cruz de Pinares -
description:
Without services, located in the middle of nature, forbidden to use barbecues. A place 1.5 km from a town, Santa Cruz de Pinares, in the province of Ávila. You have to go along a wide gravel road, which you take on the outskirts of town, where the Santa Cruz de Pinares sign is, see photo. They can park about 4 motorhomes. Place with beautiful views and a Water Dam less than 500 m away. where fishing is practiced, with total tranquility. In the town you have a shop, open in the morning, and two bars.
Many trails with impressive landscapes, to be able to walk and enjoy nature.
